ResearchProjectDef.label: genetrainer repurposing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Genetrainer repurposing unlocks the jury rigging of mech serum neurotrainers, healers, psytrainers and resurrectors to craft genetrainers, single use artifacts that inject animal genetic material in a human being, acting as a powerful implant that doesn't take the place of any organ in the body.
